original_title: Traffic disrupted near BMICH as large signboard falls across road
original_body_lines: A large signboard has fallen across the road in front of the BMICH in Colombo this evening (Dec.10), Ada Derana correspondent says.
As a result, traffic congestion is reported in the area as the vehicular movement in both directions of Bauddhaloka Mawatha, Colombo 07 is disrupted.
